name: Sticky
author: CVMH solutions

sections.description:
Adds sticky support for pages and/or custom posts.

Current features

  • Easy to use
  • Shortcode & Widget

Looking for a WordPress agency? Contact us: agence web WordPress

How to uninstall Sticky

To uninstall Sticky, you just have to de-activate the plugin from the plugins list.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the plugin and upload the “sticky” folder to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” administration page in WordPress
  3. Use the shortcode or the widget
  4. Enjoy.
